title: Looking for diamond top laner
body:
Looking for diamond top laner to join the team I manage and playing in the summoners society open ladder

Team is Diamond 3 and above.

replies.body:
currently D5 top lane main who just returned to the game after a break

-Took me 3 weeks to hit diamond and am very confident I'll be going higher

Just add me in Game if you're interested
Currently not diamond due to reset, but I hit D4 in preseason if you're willing to allow that.
